Save As Privilege Set

Use the Save As Privilege Set dialog box (Admin | Security | Users | Privileges tab | Save As Privilege Set button) to save the selected privileges and privilege sets as a new custom privilege set.

Field Descriptions

Name Enter the name for the new privilege set.
Privileges List Lists the base privileges, composite privileges, and existing privilege sets that will define this new custom privilege set.
Restrict by promotion group Enter the name of the promotion group by which to restrict the privilege set or click the Browse button to select one.

See Also
